room_title: Escape room "The Crash" by Room Escape Time in Houston
review: Great fun. Highly recommend, cannot wait to go back. The staff was excellent and had as much fun as we did.

room_title: Escape room "The Crash" by Room Escape Time in Houston
review: Took 8 grandkids there for Christmas Eve, ages 14 to 22 and put them in their hardest room. It was technology and thinking they all had their heads in phones all the time, they could get it.....wrong, too hard! They had fun though and everyone was very nice

room_title: Escape room "The Crash" by Room Escape Time in Houston
review: This is my second time doing this I love this place. The rooms are very challenging and we won this time with 3 minutes to spare
